repo_notes.content: This repository implements the Plinko PIR (Private Information Retrieval) scheme from ePrint 2024-318. The canonical protocol reference is docs/plinko_paper_index.json which indexes parsed paper content, regression test data location, and video resources.
repo_notes.author: maintainer

repo_notes.content: Regression test data (3.6GB Ethereum state subset) is hosted on Cloudflare R2 at s3://plinko-regression-data/ with endpoint https://c6ffe0823b48a4b7689d9b9e9045e465.r2.cloudflarestorage.com. See docs/plinko_paper_index.json for download details.
repo_notes.author: maintainer

repo_notes.content: The state-syncer/ crate contains the core Plinko implementation: iPRF (invertible PRF), IprfTee, Sometimes-Recurse PRP (SwapOrNotSr), true Binomial(n,p) sampling (binomial_sample / binomial_sample_tee with CT_BINOMIAL_MAX_COUNT=65536), and hint generation. The canonical Rocq specs/proofs and linking layer live in plinko/formal/ (see .github/workflows/formal.yml).
repo_notes.author: maintainer

repo_notes.content: Constant-time HintInit (--constant-time flag) for TEE execution: Uses IprfTee::inverse_ct with fixed MAX_PREIMAGES=512 iterations, BlockBitset for O(1) membership testing, ct_select_usize for branchless index clamping, and ct_xor_32_masked for conditional XOR. Protects against timing side-channels; cache side-channels are out of scope (would require ORAM). Verified against Plinko.v Coq spec and paper Fig. 7.
repo_notes.author: maintainer

repo_notes.content: Key video resource: Alex Hoover's talk 'Plinko - Single-Server PIR with Efficient Updates via Invertible PRFs' at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=okJaBn7ZXnc
repo_notes.author: maintainer

repo_notes.content: The PRP uses Morris-Rogaway Sometimes-Recurse (SR) wrapper for full-domain security. Round counts follow paper-faithful formula: t_N = ceil(7.23 lg N + 4.82 lambda + 4.82 lg p) from Morris-Rogaway 2013/560 Section 5. Default is 128-bit security.
repo_notes.author: maintainer

repo_notes.content: Formal verification status (Dec 2025): Core properties proven (SR bijection, iPRF partition, binomial range). Intentional axioms: crypto (AES-128, key derivation), math (binomial_theorem_Z), FFI (Rust refinement). One Admitted proof: hint_init_backup_streaming_eq_batch in HintInitSim.v (fold equivalence, no crypto assumptions).
repo_notes.author: maintainer
